sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SMALKAI lD, a town of Germany, in Franconia, and in the county of Henneberg : famous for the confederacy entered into by the German Proteſtants againſt the emperor, commonly called the league oſ Smalkald. The deſign of it was to defend their religion and liberties. It is ſeated on the river Werra, 25 miles ſouth- weſt of Erford, and 50 north-weſt of Bamberg. E. Long, 10. 53. N. Lat. 50. 49. It is ſubject to the prince of Heſſe-Caſſel.
